About Premier Catering

Are you working from home? Have a business constantly on the move? Leaving the country for a long period of time? Or you just need that space from your household and need a safe and accessible location to receive a your letters and parcels. Roman Post has the service for you, Located in the heart of London we service Large Business, individuals and many others from our virtual offices to our physical mailbox lockers.

Our Pricing

For just £15 a month we can receive letters and parcels on your behalf from every delivery company. In addition to this you will get a physical mailing address that you can use at your will. Get access to exclusive discounts with us when you ship with DHL, Fedex and ParcelForce.

❝ Roman Post is the place that I highly recommended if you want a hassle free service that handles all your deliveries! Extraordinary service for such a fair price. I will definitley be a long serving customer. ❞
